subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ahhh the infamous Fish!
author: black bear hollow
full_text:
Richard Smith is another who has dealt with The Fish Group. He's an  
AAEVP member. Lisa also knows about them.

w.
On Aug 17, 2008, at 4:29 PM, Lisby wrote:

> I don't think Erland was the one bothered with them. Bill  
> something...I can't remember his last name. And Charlie with the  
> ghost coffee pot. She got them, too.
>
>
> I heard a lot of what Bill got when he used to post it back on the  
> AA-EVP board. I remember none of it rising above the level of  
> swearing and threats that we get on occasion. The impression I got  
> at the time was that this was a group of deceased humans who had  
> formed a little after-death-prankster club. Yes, they could be quite  
> shitty. If I recall correctly, they called themselves the Fish Group  
> because they said they felt like fish looking out at us through  
> aquarium glass. I thought that was a really interesting comment on  
> the separation between our planes of reality.
>
> Ann


Richa d Smi h is ano he who has deal wi h The Fish G oup. He's an AAEVP membe . Lisa also knows abou hem. w.On Aug 17, 2008, a 4:29 PM, Lisby w o e:I don' hink E land was he one bo he ed wi h hem. Bill some hing...I can' emembe his las name. And Cha lie wi h he ghos co ee po . She go hem, oo.I hea d a lo o wha Bill go when he used o pos i back on he AA-EVP boa d. I emembe none o i ising abo e he le el o swea ing and h ea s ha we ge on occasion. The imp ession I go a he ime was ha his was a g oup o deceased humans who had o med a li le a e -dea h-p anks e club. Yes, hey could be qui e shi y. I I ecall co ec ly, hey called hemsel es he Fish G oup because hey said hey el like ish looking ou a us h ough aqua ium glass. I hough ha was a eally in e es ing commen on he sepa a ion be ween ou planes o eali y.Ann
